title: Neil Shenvi, Understanding Critical Theory and Woke theology in the Evangelical Church
description:
Neil Shenvi has a PhD in Theoretical Chemistry and is a homeschooling dad. He became a Christian at university and has taken up apologetics as a hobby. He's probably best known recently for reading everything he can get his hands on in the area of Critical Theory and blogging about it in terms of how this relates to Christianity. 

Neil's Blog https://shenviapologetics.com/
Christianity and Critical Theory https://shenviapologetics.com/critical-theory-and-christianity-part-1/
Diangelo is Everyone Really Equal https://shenviapologetics.com/quotes-from-sensoy-and-diangelos-is-everyone-really-equal/
